creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: man in profile from PR with beard and moustache, smoking, wearing brown hat and coat and glasses; yellow ground; very loose pencil sketch on verso - person in boat?
provenance: Nicolas Pietri, Ajaccio, France (until d. 1964). 'Private Collection, Belgium (until 2007; sale, Marie-Francoise Robert, Paris, November 23, 2007, no.65, for NIIRO Euros, to Boerner); (C. G. Boerner, New York; sold, Minneapolis Print and Drawing Fair, April 25, 2008, to Dayton); Ruth and Bruce Dayton, Wayzata, Minn. (2008); given to MIA, 2008.
title: Portrait of Maximilien Luce
